animeDescription: 6 children sit in front of the classroom and constantly gossip. When one of them is absent for three days due to a cold, the rest remain quiet as they don't want to leave the other child out from day-to-day gossip.
animeStaff: [['NHK Tokyo Jidou Gasshoudan', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Furuta Yoshiaki', ['Theme Song Composition']], ['Nanke Kouji', ['Animation Director']]]
